universal_guidelines: Use 'backdrop-blur-xl' for all floating panels to ensure 3D scene visibility.
Avoid solid opaque backgrounds in the main view. Immersion is key.
Animations should be 'ease-out-expo' for a snappy, robotic feel.
Do not use default scrollbars. Hide them or style them thin and dark.
Ensure text contrast is high (White on Dark Glass).
Use 'sonner' for notifications with a dark theme.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'three', '@react-three/fiber', '@react-three/drei', 'lucide-react', 'framer-motion', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge'. 2. Set up the 3D Canvas in the main layout. 3. Build the 'GlassPanel' component as the base for all UI. 4. Implement the 'Holographic' aesthetic using the specified colors and borders. 5. Ensure the 3D scene is performant (use instances if many objects, but for MVP simple meshes are fine).
